Photos

Good photos are essential for selling your boat. Upload 4-10 clear photos showing:

Select multiple photos (4-10 recommended). Max 10MB per photo.

Photo Tips:

  • Overall exterior shot (the "hero" photo)
  • Cockpit and helm area
  • Cabin interior
  • Sails (up if possible)
  • Engine/motor
  • Any special features or recent upgrades
  • Trailer (if included)
  • Any areas needing repair (honesty builds trust!)

Additional Information

Your listing will be reviewed and posted within 24-48 hours.

Selling Tips

  • Clean the boat before photos
  • Take photos on a sunny day
  • Price competitively - check our gallery
  • Be honest about condition
  • Respond to inquiries quickly

⚠️ Beware of Scams

Never accept payment via wire transfer or gift cards. Read our scam warnings
